mapper.select: SELECT common_code CommonCode, descript FROM common_code WHERE common_code != 'K00' AND parent_code = 'K00' AND common_code NOT IN ( SELECT rev_time FROM reservation WHERE mee_no = #{meeNo} AND rev_date = #{revDate} )

SELECT r.res_no resNo, r.mee_no meeNo, r.sch_no schNo, m.mname mname, r.rev_date revDate, r.rev_time revTime, c.descript descript, r.content content, e.ename ename FROM reservation r INNER JOIN schedules s ON r.sch_no = s.sch_no INNER JOIN emp e ON r.emp_no = e.emp_no INNER JOIN meetingroom m ON r.mee_no = m.mee_no INNER JOIN common_code c ON r.rev_time = c.common_code WHERE r.emp_no = #{empNo} AND c.parent_code = 'K00' ORDER BY r.rev_date DESC, r.rev_time DESC
